Text: Transition TeamSteve I am interested in being on the transition team I was on the team at Minute Maid when CocaCola was selling of the company to Proctor and Gamble Although the deal fell through in the end after I had left it allowed me to gain a vast array of knowledge regarding the merging of two companies their benefits and their employees One of my major duties was looking at adverse impact and comparison of benefits to ensure that employees would be whole when the deal was finalized I was also the liaison for Minute Maid during CocaColas class action lawsuit If you have any additional questions regarding my experience please do not hesitate to call me at x or at home
Out of Office AutoReply Wellesley InterviewsI will be out of the office until Monday October

Wellesley College Fall Attached is the Wellesley College Fall Forecast Please pay close attention to the dates in which you are scheduled to participate You will receive an Event Information sheet with all of the details for your event Thank you for all of your assistance and participation

Wellesley Interviews Cc The schedule for interviews at Wellesley are as follows November Preinterview Reception Attendees Jen Frasier Carol Marshall Kelly Boots Michelle Cash Sabina Rank Greeter Mog ChuYangHeu Greeter November st round Interviews Schedules Attendees Same as above November nd round interviews Attendees Andrea Reed Cindy Olson Mariella Mahan Ayesha Kanji Greeter Sona Khanova Greeter We currently have interviews scheduled Our schedule closing date is Oct we will receive the schedules at that time and they will be distributed to the interviewers Please rsvp that you are still available for those dates
